=Usage=

Select a device from the toolbox and move to right side.

http://simcir.googlecode.com/svn/assets/tutor/t1.png


Move a device back to the toolbox if you don't use.

http://simcir.googlecode.com/svn/assets/tutor/t2.png


Connect them by drag operation.

http://simcir.googlecode.com/svn/assets/tutor/t3.png


Click an input node to disconnect.

http://simcir.googlecode.com/svn/assets/tutor/t4.png


Click and select a label to edit.

http://simcir.googlecode.com/svn/assets/tutor/t5.png


You can use a circuit added to your library as an integrated circuit. Double click it to show a source circuit in new window.

http://simcir.googlecode.com/svn/assets/tutor/t6.png
